body_content.explanation: the belief in freedom and equality between people, or a system of government based on this belief, in which power is either held by elected representatives or directly by the people themselves:
examples: The government has promised to uphold the principles of democracy.
The early 1990s saw the spread of democracy in Eastern Europe.

body_content.explanation: a country in which power is held by elected representatives:
examples: Few of the Western democracies still have a royal family.
